@description.name: @description
@description.body: Installs libraries in a repository from a given release tag name

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{String} uri The name of the repository (e.g. qooxdoo/qxl.apiviewer),
  or of a library within a repository (such as ergobyte/qookery/qookeryace)
@param.description:
The name of the repository (e.g. qooxdoo/qxl.apiviewer),
  or of a library within a repository (such as ergobyte/qookery/qookeryace)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {String} tag_name The tag name of the release, such as "v1.1.0"
@param.description: The tag name of the release, such as "v1.1.0"

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{Boolean} writeToManifest Whether the library should be written to
 Manifest.json as a dependency
@param.description:
Whether the library should be written to
 Manifest.json as a dependency

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Installs libraries in a given repository from the given hash of a code tree independent from the library cache. This ignores dependency constraints. The given uri must point to a folder containing Manifest.json

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e.g. qooxdoo/qxl.apiviewer or ergobyte/qookery/qookeryace

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{String} hash
  A path into the code tree on GitHub such as "tree/892f44d1d1ae5d65c7dd99b18da6876de2f2a920"
@param.description: A path into the code tree on GitHub such as "tree/892f44d1d1ae5d65c7dd99b18da6876de2f2a920"

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{Boolean} writeToManifest Whether the library should be written to
 Manifest.json as a dependency
@param.description:
Whether the library should be written to
 Manifest.json as a dependency

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Installs libraries from a local path

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{String} uri
  The URI identifying a library (e.g. qooxdoo/qxl.apiviewer or
  ergobyte/qookery/qookeryace)
@param.description:
The URI identifying a library (e.g. qooxdoo/qxl.apiviewer or
  ergobyte/qookery/qookeryace)

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{String} dir
  The path to a local directory
@param.description: The path to a local directory

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{Boolean} writeToManifest
  Whether the library should be written to Manifest.json as a dependency
@param.description: Whether the library should be written to Manifest.json as a dependency

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the data in the lockfile and (optionally) in the manifest

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e.g. qooxdoo/qxl.apiviewer or ergobyte/qookery/qookeryace

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{String} id
  The tag name of a release such as "v1.1.0" or a tree hash such as
  tree/892f44d1d1ae5d65c7dd99b18da6876de2f2a920
@param.description:
The tag name of a release such as "v1.1.0" or a tree hash such as
  tree/892f44d1d1ae5d65c7dd99b18da6876de2f2a920

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {String} download_path The path to the downloaded repository
@param.description: The path to the downloaded repository

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{Boolean} writeToManifest
  Whether the library should be written to Manifest.json as a dependency
@param.description: Whether the library should be written to Manifest.json as a dependency

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Given a download path of a library, install its dependencies

@description.body: Given a library's manifest data, install its dependencies

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {Object} manifest

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Given the URI of a library repo and a semver range, returns the highest version compatible with the semver range and the release tag containing this version.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {String} lib_uri The URI of the library

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {String} lib_range The semver range

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Object} Returns an object with the keys "tag" and "version"
@return.description: Returns an object with the keys "tag" and "version"

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Given the download path of a library, install its applications todo use config API, use compile.js where it exists

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {String} downloadPath

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Promise<Boolean>} Returns true if applications were installed
@return.description: Returns true if applications were installed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Download repos listed in the lockfile

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Downloads a release

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {String} repo_name The name of the repository

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{String} treeish
  If prefixed by "v", the name of a release tag. Otherwise, arbitrary
  tree-ish expression (see https://help.github.com/en/articles/getting-permanent-links-to-files)
@param.description:
If prefixed by "v", the name of a release tag. Otherwise, arbitrary
  tree-ish expression (see https://help.github.com/en/articles/getting-permanent-links-to-files)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: {Boolean} force Overwrite existing downloads

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property compilerApi. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #compilerApi}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property compilerApi. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #compilerApi}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property compilerApi. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #compilerApi}.
